messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

You want to organize a fundraiser with 16 socialites. Paul is connected to Bob, Nick, Sherry, and John. Bob is connected to Paul, Nick, Sherry, and Rose. Nick is connected to Paul, Bob, Sherry and Amanda. Sherry is also connected to Paul, Bob, Nick, and William. Amanda is connected to Peter, John, Daisy, and Nick. Peter is connected to Amanda, John, Daisy, and Adam. John is connected to Paul, Daisy, Peter, and Amanda. Daisy is also connected to Amanda, Peter, John, and Maggie. Alisa is connected to Maggie, Jennifer, Adam, and Russell. Maggie is connected to Alisha, Jennifer, Daisy, and Adam. Jennifer is connected to Andrew, Alisha, Adam, and Maggie. Adam is also connected to Alisha, Maggie, Jennifer, and Peter. Andrew is connected to William, Russell, Rose, and Jennifer. William is connected to Sherry, Andrew, Russell, Rose. Russell is connected to Andrew, William, Rose, and Alsiha. Rose is also connected to Andrew, William, Russell, and Bob. Initially, you were told that Rose can donate $250K while Maggie can donate $500K. Also, if you want to get connected with Amanda, you need to pay $10K to her company. You are talking to Paul and he tells you that he can connect you with anyone you want only once. From Paul, what is the path to the person who can donate the most money? Please list the names in order, separated by commas.

The first line contains an integer, T, denoting the number of test cases.
The first line of each test case contains an integer, N, denoting the number of nodes.
The next N-1 lines contain two space-separated integers, u and v, denoting that there is an edge between node u and node v.
The next line contains an integer, Q, denoting the number of queries.
The next Q lines contain a string, S, denoting the query.

You are not required to print the expected output; it has already been taken care of. Just implement the function.

For each test case, print the path to the person who can donate the most money.
Print the names in order, separated by commas.

You do not need to read input or print anything. Your task is to complete the function find_path() which takes the graph as returns the path to the person who can donate the most money.

We strongly recommend solving this problem on your own before viewing its editorial. Do not scroll down too far if you have not done as it is a short editorial.

The problem is a simple graph traversal problem. We can use
